00085 template<typename Point>
00086 bruteNN<Point>::bruteNN(Point *p, long int N)
00087 {
00088   points.resize(N);
00089   points.assign(p, p+N);
00090 }

00097 template<typename Point>
00098 void bruteNN<Point>::ksearch(Point q, int k, 
00099                              std::vector<long unsigned int> &nn_idx)
00100 {
00101   qknn que;
00102   double distance;
00103   que.set_size(k);
00104   for(unsigned int i=0;i < points.size();++i)
00105     {
00106       distance = q.sqr_dist(points[i]);
00107       que.update(distance, i);
00108     }
00109   que.answer(nn_idx);
00110 }
00111 
00112 template<typename Point>
00113 void bruteNN<Point>::ksearch(Point q, int k, 
00114                              std::vector<long unsigned int> &nn_idx, std::vector<double> &d_indx)
00115 {
00116   qknn que;
00117   double distance;
00118   for(int i=0;i < points.size();++i)
00119     {
00120       distance = q.sqr_dist(points[i]);
00121       que.update(i, distance);
00122     }
00123   que.answer(nn_idx, d_indx);
00124 }
